Metadata.name: Signature Skills+ - Door of Hades (Thanatos)
Metadata.author: rudiger__gb
Metadata.description:
Requires and must be placed ABOVE the "Compendium Restoration Pack" in Aemulus Package Manager!
Allows Thanatos to learn the signature skill "Door of Hades" at level 76.
Deals heavy Almighty damage to all foes with medium chance of instant kill.
Power: 160 Accuracy: 90 Effect chance: 60 Cost: 32 SP
